title: The rise of cricket, the rise of India
description: The tale of a major global cultural phenomenon: Cricket commentator Harsha Bhogle describes the spectacular arrival of fast-paced 20-20 cricket as it parallels the rise of modern India.  He traces the game from its sleepy English roots to the current world of celebrity owners and million-dollar player contracts.
author: Harsha Bhogle
keywords: TED, talks, business, culture, entertainment, india, sports
